animeTitle: Kami nomi zo Shiru Sekai: 4-nin to Idol
animeDescription: Eli, Chihiro, and Miyako try to form a band but end up looking to Katsuragi for help. In the process they meet Kanon and become friends/ rivals.(Source: ANN)
